sentences.english: The cortical corkification of the root replace epidermis.
sentences.chinese: 根以皮層木栓化，代替表皮。

sentences.english: The silicides in the cuticle of wheat straw stem were studied by means of XPS-peak-differenating analysis.
sentences.chinese: 進行麥稈皮層硅化物的XPS測定及分峯擬合分析。

sentences.english: The main correlational language cortex included left temporal lobe and bilateral inferior frontal gyrus.
sentences.chinese: 主要語言相關皮層區爲左顳葉及雙側額下回。

sentences.english: There is no decussation in the lateral corticospinal tract after the decussation at the medullary pyramids.
sentences.chinese: 它們在髓狀錐體交叉後，不會在皮層脊髓側束中交叉。

sentences.english: But such triggers don't seem to trouble the patients with a damaged insula.
sentences.chinese: 但是這種激發看來已不會困擾島葉皮層損傷的患者。

sentences.english: Wall thickening ofCasparian strip is evident in its endodermis.
sentences.chinese: 莖有內皮層，凱氏帶加厚明顯。

sentences.english: After the egg fertilized, it Underwent cortical reaction and formed fertilization membrane.
sentences.chinese: 卵子受精後，發生皮層反應形成受精膜。

sentences.english: Collagen is the main ingredient of skin corium 72%.
sentences.chinese: 膠原蛋白是人體皮膚真皮層中的主要成分，佔72%。

sentences.english: The basal ganglia, the subcortical structure, participates the process of characters writing.
sentences.chinese: 基底神經節作爲皮層下結構，參與了文字書寫過程。

sentences.english: Sthe motor cortex is involved in planning, and executing arm movement.
sentences.chinese: 運動皮層對手臂運動進行計劃，和執行。

sentences.english: Lined gray matter was isodensity on CT and continuous with adjacent cerebral cortices .
sentences.chinese: 所襯灰質與大腦皮層連續，CT影像與灰質等密度。

sentences.english: The aerial stem and the underground stem of A. selengensis all had secretory cavity which was distributed on the cortex.
sentences.chinese: 藜蒿地上莖和地下莖均具分泌囊，並分佈在皮層。

sentences.english: The endodermis had clear Casparian strips on its cells.
sentences.chinese: 其內皮層細胞上凱氏帶明顯。

sentences.english: The "perfect" microdermabrasion is performed within the shallow dermis in order to achieve the effect of regenerative repair.
sentences.chinese: 磨皮是在淺層真皮層，如此才能達到再生修補的療效。

sentences.english: Epilesy after cerebral infarction mostly happens in cerebral cortex infarctions .
sentences.chinese: 腦梗死後癲癇發作多見於腦皮層梗塞者。

sentences.english: Split ends occur when the cuticle is damaged and the fibres of the cortex unravel.
sentences.chinese: 髮梢開叉是角質層受損和皮層的纖維開裂所致。
